cleaned_text: A treatment lasting an hour and 15 minutes to treat your skin to a burst of energy and help it to defend itself in any situation against the harmful effects of environmental stress, which can accelerate skin ageing. The core of the intensive treatment, the trio of exclusive active ingredients elderberry-siberian ginseng-peptides* for an anti-pollution protection/detox/energy action. THE STORY OF A KNOW-HOW. The brand's flagship method, Digi-Esthétique® is an application technique specially developed by and for beauty therapists, to optimize treatments and absorption of active ingredients. Digi-Esthétique combines acupressure and modelling techniques from Eastern and Western cultures. Sothys has always invested in the development of unique treatment rituals that combine sensoriality, efficiency and a personalized approach in order to make every visit to a Sothys Institute or spa an experience that nurtures both the body and the mind. This is an art that makes Sothys exceptional. * Except in the revealing solution (organic elderberry extract only). Satisfaction right from the first treatment : 100% The skin is recharged with energy the complexion is bright and appears depolluted.* [ See more efficiency results ](#section--resultats-prouves) A 1h15
